'''Pass the Luck''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Fried Shrimp Beanballs]] with [[Mualani]].<!--The [[recipe]] for {{subst:#var:base}} how to obtain the recipe-->

Pass the Luck increases all party members' [[Shield]] Strength by '''35'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
